dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Alright, then... Care to give us an explanation, Shrenne?
Shrenne blankly looks at Dongrang, her face wooden as if she's forgotten how to make expressions.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Since when did you join their side?

dataList.title: K Corp. Laboratory
dataList.content: ...You really are something. You don't even act surprised.

dataList.title: K Corp. Laboratory
dataList.content: Hah, employees that can be brought back to life without the ampules, huh... This wasn't in the plans... It's not fair.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: When I asked why you volunteered to follow me at the laboratory, you told me this:

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: "Three of my coworkers died."

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Five of us died in that attack. Three is the number of casualties the technology liberation alliance suffered.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Oh, and I checked your network history, too.

dataList.title: K Corp. Laboratory
dataList.content: You did what... You're allowed to do that?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: So they keep telling you, it takes a full day and the night after to name all the benefits of the best employee.

dataList.title: K Corp. Laboratory
dataList.content: That stupid "best" tripe again...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I saw that you exchanged tons of mail with Ran even after she left. What was it about? You wouldn't reply to a single one I sent asking to go grab coffee together.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I do suppose... you've respected Ran a lot ever since you joined. Even your password was set as "missyouran", how about that?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Wait, is this... all true?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I don't understand. K Corp's research institutes are the best workplace you could ask for as a scientist; it's a stable job, cares about employee well-being, and has the limelight of the academy.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: But, why would you turn your back on it and collude with those terrorists...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I saw you as a researcher with a promising future... You had a long way to go compared to Mr. Dongrang, but still...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Yeah, Shrenne. Why don't you say it yourself?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Why did you decide to collude with them?

dataList.title: K Corp. Laboratory
K Corp. Laboratory
dataList.content: The tears wouldn't stop.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: You...

dataList.title: K Corp. Laboratory
dataList.content: You know what that means, right? I...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development

dataList.content: We couldn't hear the rest of what Shrenne tried to say.
At first, it looked like a thin red line was drawn on her body...
Then we realized that it wasn't just a line.
Hey... Shrenne...
Cut clean in half, fluid splashed from the severed hemispheres of her brain as if to convey that regeneration ampules won't heal this.
Hah, haha... Shut your mouths and keep still. Don't even breathe.
The people who slew Shrenne along with the wall behind her without letting even their footsteps be heard were...
Fixers inanely treading shadows... I'll give you the honor of being called F.I.T.S. Heh.
Fixers who work like that... would belong to... Shi Association.
An Association of Fixers that exclusively take assassination requests.
They most likely aren't ones we could easily fight and defeat. It depends on how much they were paid and what Section are they from, but in this case...
Seeing that only Ryōshū was able to pick up hints of their presence... They most certainly won't be amateurs from Sections 5 or 6.

dataList.title: Shi Association
K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Ms. Shrenne... Why...
Tsk, gone already.
Ryōshū clicked her tongue and complained about the assassins' retreat, even though I couldn't hear or see them at all.
How ridiculous. Torn by inner conflict.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Senior Researcher Ran was Shrenne's mentor when she first joined the firm. It looks like their bond lasted much longer than I thought.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: You see, Dante? We were peers working for the same firm, and there's still collusion and fraternity.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Betrayal, division, connivance. It happens in any group of people... I guess it's an inescapable cycle.
<Not sure there's any point in telling me this...>

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Say... How much do you trust your Sinners?
<I’m… sorry, what?>

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: You know virtually nothing about them, do you? Much like how I couldn't know everything about Shrenne. Am I wrong?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: You... don't even know which is the one that has a history with me.
